description: portrait bust of poet, facing slightly R
inscription:
Signature and Inscriptions

on mount, below image, in brown: [FROM LIFE REGISTERED PHOTOGRAPH COPYRIGHT JULIA MARGARET CAMERON]; in pencil: [GIVEN TO MY OLD AND DEAR FRIEND (illegible)/ BY JULIA MARGARET CAMERON/ IN THE POETS HOME OF FARRINGTON/ FAREWELL DAY OCT. 10TH (70? OR 78)]; center bottom, in brown: [A. TENNYSON]; on verso, in pencil: GENUINE AUTOGRAPH/ MC
title: Alfred Tennyson
